data.title: Fine-Tuning The HDTV Picture
data.meta_description: My two columns on high-definition TV (BW -- Jan. 26 and Feb. 2) attracted a lot of interest from readers, much of it in the form of requests for additional information. In this column, I'll try to answer some of those questions.
data.text:
My two columns on high-definition TV (BW -- Jan. 26Bloomberg Terminal and Feb. 2Bloomberg Terminal) attracted a lot of interest from readers, much of it in the form of requests for additional information. In this column, I'll try to answer some of those questions.

What about using a video projector and separate movie-style screen as a digital-TV system?
